short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Colorize any Black & White image to bring it to life. You can bring your great grandparents to 21st century color!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revitalize your black and white images with ChromaColorizer: The ultimate Chrome extension for effortless colorization. Witness the magic as your grayscale visuals come alive with vibrant and lifelike hues, breathing new life into your nostalgic moments. Experience the power of color transformation at your fingertips.
